channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Credit-card stocks are sliding, but Trump’s plan for a 10% rate cap isn’t a done deal
item.description: A 10% cap on interest rates could mean a big hit to earnings at companies like Capital One and Synchrony. But a Jefferies analyst says it’s “highly un...

item.title: Stocks are signaling that another commodities ‘supercycle’ is afoot in 2026
item.description: Parts of the financial market linked to hard assets and tangible items appear to be settling into what could become a prolonged boom.

item.title: Why Amazon and Meta could be standout stocks in the ‘Magnificent Seven’ this year
item.description: The pressure is on for Big Tech companies to deliver a return on their AI investments, making Amazon and Meta the top trades for 2026, according to Be...

item.title: Why the market is more sensitive to this latest showdown between Trump and Fed chief Jerome Powell
item.description: Precious metal prices surge as conflict intensifies

item.title: Why Michael Burry’s AI skepticism can be explained by an escalator that Warren Buffett built
item.description: The “Big Short” investor explains again why he is skeptical over AI spending and why Nvidia and Palantir won’t stay on top.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
